name: Featured product by category name
author: Ketan Patel

sections.description:
Woocommerce featured products is allow to show featured products by category. It’s easy to use by short code..

Features

  • Easy installation and manager
  • Responsive design support
  • Show featured products in your category and multi categories.

Short Code

[featured_product_categories cats="category_ID" per_cat="8" columns="4"]
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘woocommerce-featured-product-by-categories-kepy’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the woocommerce-featured-product-by-categories-kepy plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Use the shortcode [featured_product_categories cats="category_ID" per_cat="8" columns="4"] to display featured product by category name.
sections.changelog:
1.0
– Featured product by category

1.1
– Test with wordpress version 4.5.3
